brainly_data.question: Imagine you are a physician. A 40- year-old patient comes to you complaining about her health. During your consultation, you find out she has consumed a 12-pack of beer every night for the past 17 years. Speculate the condition of her body, making sure to include the effects of alcohol on her brain, intestines, liver and bones.
brainly_data.subject: Health

all_answers.question: Imagine you are a physician. A 40- year-old patient comes to you complaining about her health. During your consultation, you find out she has consumed a 12-pack of beer every night for the past 17 years. Speculate the condition of her body, making sure to include the effects of alcohol on her brain, intestines, liver and bones.
all_answers.subject: Health
all_answers.text: She can have a really bad health such as  intense head aches liver condotions her bones are weakened and her internal organs can all be damaged.she has a very high probality of having cancer.
